overview:
Loop tags are used to loop over an array, without lambda evaluation
or testing for truthyness or pushing new hash context frames (hashes
in the array however are pushed).

Loop tags SHOULD be treated as standalone when
appropriate.

tests.name: Loop over an empty array
tests.desc: Loop over an empty array should not evaluate contents

tests.name: Loop immediate
tests.desc: Loop over an array with immediate values

tests.name: Loop hash
tests.desc: Loop over an array with hashes

tests.name: Loop single
tests.desc: Loop over a hash should not push a new context

tests.name: Nested loops single
tests.desc: Loop over a hash should not push a new context

tests.name: Context Misses
tests.desc: Context misses should be considered as an empty array

tests.name: Surrounding Whitespace
tests.desc: Loops should not alter surrounding whitespace.

tests.name: Internal Whitespace
tests.desc: Loops should not alter internal whitespace.

tests.name: Indented Inline Sections
tests.desc: Single-line Loops should not alter surrounding whitespace.

tests.name: Standalone Lines
tests.desc: Standalone lines should be removed from the template.

tests.name: Indented Standalone Lines
tests.desc: Indented standalone lines should be removed from the template.

tests.name: Standalone Line Endings
tests.desc: "\r\n" should be considered a newline for standalone tags.

tests.name: Standalone Without Previous Line
tests.desc: Standalone tags should not require a newline to precede them.

tests.name: Standalone Without Newline
tests.desc: Standalone tags should not require a newline to follow them.

tests.name: Padding
tests.desc: Superfluous in-tag whitespace should be ignored.
